name: Mystery Box 5: Elements
description:
A UNFORGETTABLE PUZZLE ADVENTURE
Explore a new series of intricate boxes filled with alluring enigmas and brain-teasing challenges that will leave you a lasting impression

THE ELEMENTS STONE
Unlock all 10 boxes of the game and play this extra challenge in the room of the Elements Stone

EXCEPTIONAL GAME DESIGN
With a straightforward user interface and captivating puzzles, this game promises an engaging experience that expertly balances challenge and entertainment, keeping you engaged for hours.

A CAPTIVATING SOUNDTRACK
Each Box has its music theme, for you to play this adventure in a transcendental way

GOT STUCK?
Click the bulb button in the scene to get a hint that will help you solve the puzzles.
In case you got really stuck on a puzzle, feel free to get in touch with the developer to get some more hints

SHARE YOUR ACHIEVEMENTS
Let your community and friends know what you're playing and how far you've gone in this escape room adventure!

——————————•——————————

XSGames is an indie game dev from Italy, since 2021, creator of the Mystery Box and The Da Vinci Cryptex game series
